goals.description: Aprende a moverte hacia la izquierda
goals.base_code_1: if (this.cursors.right.isDown) { this.sprite.play('player_animation_moveRight', 5, true); this.sprite.body.velocity.x = this.MAX_VELOCITY_X; if (this.direction == State.LOOKINGLEFT) {this.direction = State.LOOKINGRIGHT; } }
goals.base_code_2: else { if (this.direction == State.LOOKINGLEFT) { this.sprite.play('player_animation_standUpLeft'); } else if (this.direction == State.LOOKINGRIGHT) { this.sprite.play('player_animation_standUpRight'); } this.sprite.body.velocity.x = 0; }
